overview:
Heikki’s area of responsibility is Localization.

As Localization Manager, Heikki’s tasks range from managing and coordinating the localization efforts, implementing the service into foreign languages and the timely flow of all localization project actions from initiation to development ensuring that the projects meet our standard of quality.

Furthermore, Heikki also keeps the communication between Moogo’s users flowing by contacting them, and does the usual social media leg work by blogging, facebooking and twittering.

As a native to Finland, where essentially every child is born with skates on and an affinity towards ice hockey, Heikki was no different when he popped out. Heikki devotes as much free time as possible to enjoy this thinking man’s sport, where grown men chase after a round circular black object and hope not to strain anything in the process. Quite often the latter part is done poorly.

Before landing his gig at Moogo, Heikki was off on an adventure in the current olympic capital of the world, Vancouver. During his stay, he managed to work for three different companies simultaneously without completely losing his tiny mind by doing Marketing, Advertising and Public Relations work.
